br.uff.midiacom.ana.transition
Class NCLTransition<T extends NCLTransition>

java.lang.Object

          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.transition.NCLTransition<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, java.lang.Comparable<T>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLTransition<T extends NCLTransition>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<T>

Esta classe define uma transição da Nested Context Language (NCL).

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
